title: Macbook crashes after zoe's patch
body: After zoe's patch, Macbook will crash while playing league. Sometime it crashes several times in a game but sometime it is just fine.  How should I do to solve this problem.

replies.body: If it's crashing often just after a patch, it's pretty likely some of the game files weren't updated properly on your end. Try running a quick repair, and if that doesn't help run through the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). After that, you may need to move onto a reinstall with admin privileges.
